manda magen pasuwa wenath miniseku awith ee siyalla bhukthi windiyi.+ 19 eheth ohu pragnyawanthayeku wewida nathahoth modayeku wewida kiya pawasiya hakke katada?+ ohu kebandu keneku wuwada mage dathe uthsahayen ha pragnyawen labagath siyalla himi wanne ohutayi.+ meyada maha nishpalakamaki. 20 ebawin mama wehesa mahansi wi ira yata kala siyalu wada gana sitha kalakirunemi.+ 21 manda miniseku thama pragnyawada danumada dakshathada yodaganimin wehesa mahansi wi wadaka niratha wunath+ eyin prathipala bhukthi windinne ee wenuwen kisi uthsahayak nodaru ayeki.+ meyada maha nishpalakamak menma dukaki.+ 22 miniseku ira yata wehesa mahansi wi karana siyalu wadawalatath ohuge awanka uthsahayatath ohuta labenne kumakda?+ 23 ohuge jiwitha kalaya purawatama ohu karana siyalu wadawalin ohuta labenne duk karadara pamani.+ rathriyewath ohuge sithata kisi wiwekayak labenne natha.+ meyada nishpalakamaki. 24 miniseku thaman wehesa mahansi wi upayagath de bhukthi winda, ka bi sathutin sitima tharam sahima gena dena deyak ma daka natha.+ eya saba dewigen lada aashirwadayaki.+ mamada eya addutuwemi. 25 manda mata wada honda kama+ bima aththe wena katada?+ 26 dewi thama idiriye yahapathwa hasirena+ minisata pragnyawada danaganmada prithiyada laba deyi.+ eheth pawkaraya wehesa mahansi wi wada kalath awasanayedi ohuta sidu wanne, thama ras karagath de saba dewi idiriye yahapathwa hasirena thanaththata dimatayi.+ meyada sulanga pasupasa hambaa yannak men wu nishpala wayamaki.+
